items.sentence: How long did it take you to finish reading that book?
How long does it take to learn to play the xylophone?
I always buy fresh vegetables instead of frozen ones.
I called a few friends and we had an impromptu party.
Not knowing what to expect, Tom was caught off guard.
I thought you wouldn\'t notice that Tom wasn\'t here.
Tom says he can\'t put up with this noise any longer.
Whether you have a good voice or not doesn\'t matter.
Tom dreams of owning a house in the center of Boston.
Tom explained to Mary why he needed to buy a new car.
